### remediate_install::install

Install Puppet remedeiate docker containers

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `remediate_install::install` class.

##### `install_dir`

Data type: `String`



##### `license_file`

Data type: `String`



##### `compose_url`

Data type: `String`



Default value: ' https://storage.googleapis.com/remediate/stable/latest/docker-compose.yml'

Check firewall is running

**Supports noop?** false

## Plans

### remediate_install

Bolt plan to install Puppet remediate

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `remediate_install` plan.

##### `$nodes`

The target nodes

##### `$install_docker`

Flag fpr Docker install. Valid input is 'y' or 'no'

##### `$init_swarm`

Initialize Docker Swarm during installation. This will initialize a first manager swarm node. Valid input is 'y' or 'n'

##### `nodes`

Data type: `TargetSpec`



##### `install_docker`

Data type: `String[1]`



##### `init_swarm`

Data type: `String[1]`



##### `install_compose`

Data type: `String[1]`



##### `install_remediate`

Data type: `String[1]`



##### `configure_firewall`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: 'n'

##### `license_file`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `undef`

##### `compose_version`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '1.24.1'

##### `win_install_dir`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'c:\remediate'

##### `unix_install_dir`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/opt/remediate'

##### `enforce_system_requirements`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `noop_mode`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

The remediate_install::check_requirements class.

The following parameters are available in the `remediate_install::check_requirements` plan.

##### `nodes`

Data type: `TargetSpec`
